nodes.text: The plot to assassinate Emperor Palpatine was a chain of events which the Galactic Empire's propaganda Minister Pitina Mar-Mas Voor orchestrated to set up the eventual death of Emperor Sheev Palpatine. The plot was exposed to the public by Chelli Aphra, and Voor was beheaded by Darth Vader.

The plot to assassinate Emperor Palpatine serves as the main plot of Doctor Aphra Book VII: Unspeakable Rebel Superweapon, the seventh story arc from the Marvel Comics' Doctor Aphra comic series. It first appeared in Doctor Aphra 32, written by Simon Spurrier, illustrated by Wilton Santos and Caspar Wijngaard, and released on May 8, 2019
